feed.title: How Not To Dev - software-design
feed.subtitle: Exposing anti-patterns, architectural mistakes, and badly written code — so you know what not to do.

entry.title: Dirty Code Anti-Patterns: What Bad Code Actually Looks Like
entry.summary: Writing clean code isn’t just about making your code work—it’s about making it understandable, maintainable, and a joy to work with. Here are the essential principles every developer should internalize.
